currently.title: Currently under education
currently.content: Not too long to go now.

job.headline: Aarhus Universitetshospital
job.content: After I finished working in postal, I was permanently employed in the logistics department.

job.headline: Aarhus Universitetshospital
job.content: I started out as an unskilled service postal worker at Skejby University Hospital, where I brought mail and samples to the entire hospital. Including the psychiatric department.

job.headline: Forsvaret
job.content: Conscripted Private in Nørresundby kasserne, sanitation.

job.headline: Aarhus Universitetshospital
job.content: I worked in the kitchen when the Municipal Hospital was still at Nørrebrogade. I later jumped between the kitchen and the temp office, where I worked as a food delivery driver in the hospital. There are small gaps in which I did not work the kitchen between 2012-2018, but I always ended up back there.

job.headline: Kvickly (COOP)
job.content: I worked in Fruit & Green department in Kvickly, Veri Centret, as a youth worker. Where I handled fruit and vegetables, as well as flowers.

skills.headline: JavaScript/TypeScript OOP
skills.content: I'm delving into JavaScript and TypeScript, learning the ropes of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles. While not an expert, I've got a foundational understanding and actively experiment with coding styles to improve efficiency. Excited to continue learning and contribute to web development projects.

skills.headline: Elevated CSS Styling
skills.content: As a web developer, I specialize in planning and crafting CSS for small web solutions. My focus includes optimizing code for various platforms and devices, with a particular emphasis on customizing and extending existing CSS frameworks, especially Tailwind CSS. While proficient in using Sass for streamlined styling, I prefer leveraging the power and utility-first approach of Tailwind CSS for efficient and scalable styling.

skills.headline: Node.js and Build Tools Explorer
skills.content: Actively exploring the Node.js ecosystem, NPM, and Webpack in my educational journey. While not yet an expert, I'm gaining hands-on experience with Node.js for server-side scripting, managing dependencies with NPM, and optimizing builds with Webpack.

skills.headline: Integration of data via API's
skills.content: Specializing in seamless data integration and API construction for efficient data extraction. Proficient in the HTTP protocol, I navigate the interplay between database structure and frontend development. My expertise includes both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer methods, ensuring compliance with relevant legislation.

skills.headline: React and Next.js Learner
skills.content: Actively exploring React and dipping into Next.js as part of my ongoing educational journey. Building a foundation in creating dynamic user interfaces with React and taking initial steps into Next.js to understand features like server-side rendering. Eager to gain hands-on experience and enhance my skills in building web applications.
